statements: SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT survey_date, customer_id FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, survey_response FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score < 5 ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_response LIKE '%positive%' AND survey_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 7;
SELECT * FROM predictive_analytics_models ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, prediction_date FROM predictive_analytics_models WHERE satisfaction_level < 5;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM customer_survey_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 8;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_data WHERE feedback LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_survey_data ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM customer_survey_data;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS survey_count FROM customer_survey_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT age, gender FROM CustomerInformation WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm FROM PredictiveModel WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY email_address DESC
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY survey_date ASC
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM PredictiveModel ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT response_id, customer_id, survey_date, question_1 FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_1 ILIKE '%satisfied%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerDetails WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, description FROM PredictiveModels WHERE create_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(overall_satisfaction) AS max_satisfaction FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT model_name, description, create_date FROM PredictiveModels WHERE model_id > 3;
SELECT customer_id, forecast_date, predicted_satisfaction FROM SatisfactionForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date FROM customer_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy_score FROM predictive_models WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM customer_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions WHERE LENGTH(question_text) > 50;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, question_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 3 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy_score, last_updated FROM predictive_models WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
